Bygg hus med Mulle Mekk fikk "2003 Bologna New Media Prize" ved ÃƒÂ¥pningen av Bolognas ÃƒÂ¥rlige barnebokmesse den 2 april 2003. As they help the main character design an build a house, children also explore an island, interacting with its friendly inhabitants. The game requires problem solving and creativity and offers prosocial messages of cooperation and comradery".
